title: Does the new Honor System reset Reform Period?

embed.description: A huge update to the Honor system lets you vote for your team members with new categories, rise in Honor levels, and unlock exclusive rewards along the way.

body:
Hi, I was just wondering if the new Honor System will reset those who are in
a reform period, or if they will still need to show good behavior to receive a
fresh start.

replies.body: The video released today indicates everyone starts at rank 2 (baseline) of the honor system. So you'll get keys for just playing games. As it pertains to punishments (say you just got off a 14-day ban) I don't think it resets that your punishment account standings, but it didn't say anything about that.

Yeah, that's why I made this discussion to see if any Rioters or well-informed people could tell me. But if I'm being fair, (maybe Riot didn't intend this) the people that did really well with the old honor system receive no benefit so maybe those that did below average with the old honor system will receive a clean slate as well. That does contradict itself though because that would mean chat-restrictions and temporary bans would be lifted if this is a clean slate idea.

People will still need to ride out any existing punishments, but from a honor rewards eligibility perspective you'll have a fresh start.
